text: Annona spraguei is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to Panama. It is threatened by habitat loss. Its pollen is shed as permanent tetrads.Walker JW (1971) Pollen Morphology, Phytogeography, and Phylogeny of the Annonaceae. Contributions from the Gray Herbarium of Harvard University, 202: 1-130. ==References== * Mitré, M. 1998. Annona spraguei. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. title: Annona spraguei
